<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft delete a segment by ID

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
